comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Apparently this is Polish wrestler Stanislaus Zbyszko (1879?-1967), who is the subject of this page at the Professional Wrestling Hall of Fame website.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: whyaduck: Thanks for helping us track down the correct name of man depicted in this photo. We'll change the source data and reload the description.

comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: After seeing this recently added photo, I'm wondering if maybe the photo above is not Stanislaus Zybszko, but his younger brother, Wladek. On the Internet, many photos identified as Stanislaus Zybszko show him wearing a moustache, while photos of Wladek invariably show him without facial hair.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: whyaduck: We believe the photo is of Stanislaus Zbyszko. Check the other picture of him at this link: www.wrestling-titles.com/personalities/zbyszko_stanislaus/
